name: BeatBounce
description:
Imagine a rhythm game, but its a platformer where you dash into balls.

Well here ya go, this is a game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #12

Currently there is only 2 tracks, one of them being the tutorial track.

I had to cut it short because of time constraints, but I might continue to work on this.

(This game is also inspired by Friday Night Funkin', go check it out if you haven't)

IMPORTANT

If you want to change you name, go into ENTERNAMEHERE.txt and change it. Keep it in the quotation marks tho. 

(If you make the name more than 4 Letters, scores might start to clip of the screen, so be warned)

IMPORTANT FOR STREAMERS

If you wanna compete against other streamers and have their scores in the game, do this:

1. Go into APPENDUSERS.txt

You'll see this:

 [["OSO", 90]]

To change it, just replace the name and the score: 

[["STRE", 45]]

To add new scores, re-paste in the last streamer list in and change it: 

[["STRE", 90],["OTY", 125]]

The scores will be added and ordered automatically, so add as many as you want.
